18:51 <JuanDaugherty> I just had to deal with somebody spamming a mediawiki instance, it was interesting to see the contrast between the two packages..  
18:52 <JuanDaugherty> basically it's the contrast between PHP and java  
18:53 <JuanDaugherty> btw, Luis Arias's grails plugin is pretty much useless, and it's more than 2 years old  
19:08 <JuanDaugherty> doubtless he has something much more serviceable in the balsamiq infrastructure
